quotes.quote: Nature uses human imagination to lift her work of creation to even higher levels.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon
quotes.quotes: A brier rose whose buds yield fragrant harvest for the honey bee.

quotes.quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quotes: I think and think for months and years. Ninety-nine times, the conclusion is false. The hundredth time I am right.

quotes.quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli
quotes.quotes: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.

quotes.quote: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quotes.quotes: The mediator of the inexpressible is the work of art.

quotes.quote: Honor is not the exclusive property of any political party.
quotes.author: Voltaire
quotes.quotes: Paradise was made for tender hearts; hell, for loveless hearts.
